main event: A civilian reported that 'flying saucers' are being manufactured in Madagascar, which was later evaluated as a hoax.
interesting points: The report included three sketches of saucers,The case was evaluated as a hoax due to lack of evidence of manufacturing in Madagascar, Observations show a large silvery object traveling at high speed, The object appeared luminous with blue-green coloring, The sighting lasted for about 5-10 minutes and it seemed to split into two parts before reuniting.
sighted object: large silvery object in the sky
